sen.j: 株式会社一澤信三郎帆布（かぶしきがいしゃいちざわしんざぶろうはんぷ）とは、京都市東山区にある布製かばんのメーカーである。
sen.e: Ichizawa Shinzaburo Hanpu Co., Ltd. is a manufacturer of bags made with cloth in Higashiyama Ward, Kyoto City.
Ichizawa Shinzaburo Hanpu Co., Ltd. is a manufacturer of bags made with cloth in Higashiyama Ward, Kyoto City.
Ichizawa Shinzaburo Hanpu Co., Ltd. is a manufacturer of bags made with cloth in Higashiyama Ward, Kyoto City.

sen.j: 通称 「しんざぶ」。
sen.e: It is commonly called 'Shinzabu.'
It is commonly called 'Shinzabu.'
It is commonly called 'Shinzabu.'

sen.j: 2006年、一澤帆布工業（一澤帆布店）から全ての職人と従業員が独立して創設した。
sen.e: In 2006, all the craftsmen and employees got independent from Ichizawa Hanpu Co., Ltd (Ichizawa Hanpu Store) and established it.
sen.cmt: 一澤帆布工業が登録でIchizawa-hanpu.co.jpとなっていますが、参照サイトを見た上でIchizawa Hanpu Co., Ltd.にしました。
sen.e: In 2006, all the craftsmen and employees became independent from Ichizawa Hanpu Co., Ltd (Ichizawa Hanpu Store) and established a new company.
In 2006, all the craftsmen and employees became independent from Ichizawa Hanpu Co., Ltd (Ichizawa Hanpu Store) and established a new company.

sen.j: 2008年3月、旧店舗（古門前北 東大路通東側）から、現所在地へ店舗を移転。
sen.e: In March in 2008, the store premises were relocated from the old premises (Furumonzen kita, East of Higashioji-dori Street) to the present location.
In March in 2008, the store premises were relocated from the old premises (Furumonzen kita, East of Higashioji-dori Street) to the present location.
In March in 2008, the store premises were relocated from the old premises (Furumonzen kita, East of Higashioji-dori Street) to the present location.

sen.j: 製造・販売する商品
sen.e: Products to make and sell
Products to make and sell
Products to make and sell

sen.j: 帆布（はんぷ）と呼ばれる綿および麻製の厚布で作られているカバンが主力商品である。
sen.e: The leading products are bags made with thick cloth of cotton or hemp called Hanpu (sailcloth).
The leading products are bags made with thick cloth of cotton or hemp called Hanpu (sailcloth).
The leading products are bags made with thick cloth of cotton or hemp called Hanpu (sailcloth).

sen.j: 実用性の高いデザイン、豊富な色、抜群の耐久性などの特色がある。
sen.e: They feature highly practical design, various colors and excellent durability.
They feature a highly practical design, various colors and excellent durability.
They feature a highly practical design, various colors and excellent durability.

sen.j: 一澤帆布時代にはブランド品として若者に人気を集め、写真、登山、地質調査などの機材運搬用のかばんとしても根強い支持を受けてきた。
sen.e: In the time of Ichizawa Hanpu, they were popular amoung young people as brandname products, and have remained very popular as bags to carry equipment for photography, mountain climbing, or geological research.

In the time of Ichizawa Hanpu, they were popular amoung young people as brandname products, and have remained very popular as bags to carry equipment for photography, mountain climbing, or geological research.

In the time of Ichizawa Hanpu, they were popular among young people as brandname products, and have remained very popular as bags to carry equipment for photography, mountain climbing, or geological research.

sen.j: 信三郎帆布では主に、2つのブランドを扱う。
sen.e: Shinzaburo Hanpu mainly handles with two brands.
Shinzaburo Hanpu mainly handles two brands.
Shinzaburo Hanpu mainly handles two brands.

sen.j: 信三郎帆布
sen.e: Shinzaburohanpu
Shinzaburohanpu
Shinzaburohanpu

sen.j: 一澤帆布時代の伝統を受け継ぐ、無地帆布の帆布袋。
sen.e: A Hanpu bag made with plain sailcloth, continuing the tradition in the time Ichizawa Hanpu.
A Hanpu bag made with plain sailcloth, continuing the tradition from the time of Ichizawa Hanpu.
A Hanpu bag made with plain sailcloth, continuing the tradition from the time of Ichizawa Hanpu.

sen.j: 定番の手提げやランドセル型リュックサック、ショルダーバッグなどがある。
sen.e: There are standard handbags, backpacks of school bag style, and shoulder bags.
There are standard handbags, backpacks of school bag style, and shoulder bags.
There are standard handbags, backpacks of school bag style, and shoulder bags.

sen.j: 従来の無地帆布に加えて、空色や桜色、若草色などの色も加わっている。
sen.e: Besides the traditional plain sailcloth, colors including sky blue, cherry pink, and grass green have been added.
Besides the traditional plain sailcloth, colors including sky blue, cherry pink, and grass green have been added.
Besides the traditional plain sailcloth, colors including sky blue, cherry pink, and grass green have been added.

sen.j: 信三郎カバン（布へんに包と書く当て字）
sen.e: Shinzaburokaban (Shinzaburo bag, with an originally created character using the words meaning cloth and wrap)
Shinzaburokaban (Shinzaburo bag, with an originally created character using the words meaning cloth and wrap)
Shinzaburokaban (Shinzaburo bag, with an originally created character using the words meaning cloth and wrap)

sen.j: 本麻や柄帆布を使った、これまでにないライン。
sen.e: A new line using hemp and patterned sailcloth.
A new line using hemp and patterned sailcloth.
A new line using hemp and patterned sailcloth.

sen.j: 更紗模様や「鉄腕アトム」の図柄などをあしらっている。
sen.e: They have design such as Calico patterns and 'Astro Boy.'
They have design such as Calico patterns and 'Astro Boy.'
They have design such as Calico patterns and 'Astro Boy.'

sen.j: 店舗情報
sen.e: Store information
Store information
Store information

sen.j: 同社の商品は、京都市東山区東大路通古門前北の店舗でのみ購入出来る。
sen.e: Their products can be bought only at the store at Furumonzen kita, Higashioji-dori Street, Higashiyama Ward, Kyoto City.
Their products can be bought only at the store at Furumonzen kita, Higashioji-dori Street, Higashiyama Ward, Kyoto City.
Their products can be bought only at the store at Furumonzen kita, Higashioji-dori Street, Higashiyama Ward, Kyoto City.

sen.j: 現在、通信販売はしていない。
sen.e: They don't have mail-order service currently.
They currently don't have mail-order service.
They currently don't have mail-order service.

sen.j: 破損した場合は、修繕も行っている。
sen.e: In case of breakage, they also repair.
In case of damage, they also do repairs.
In case of damage, they also do repairs.

sen.j: 営業日時：
sen.e: Business hours:
Business hours:
Business hours:

sen.j: 月曜から土曜・祝日は、午前9時より午後6時まで。
sen.e: Monday to Saturday and National Holiday/9:00 A.M. to 6:00 P.M.
Monday to Saturday and National Holiday/9:00 A.M. to 6:00 P.M.
Monday to Saturday and National Holiday/9:00 A.M. to 6:00 P.M.

sen.j: 日曜は、定休（祝日と重なるときも休業）。
sen.e: Sunday/Closed (Holiday Sunday as well).
Sunday/Closed (Holiday Sunday as well).
Sunday/Closed (Holiday Sunday as well).

sen.j: ただし、夏期休業・冬期休業・臨時休業あり。
sen.e: Note that they have summer holidays, winter holidays and extra holidays.
Note that they have summer holidays, winter holidays and extra holidays.
Note that they have summer holidays, winter holidays and extra holidays.

sen.j: 交通案内：
sen.e: Access:
Access:
Access:

sen.j: JR京都駅から市バスD2乗り場 206番バス 「知恩院前」下車、徒歩すぐ。
sen.e: A short walk from the 'Chionin-mae' bus stop, by Number 206 bus from City bus D2 platform at JR Kyoto Station.
A short walk from the 'Chionin-mae' bus stop, by Number 206 bus from City bus D2 platform at JR Kyoto Station.
A short walk from the 'Chionin-mae' bus stop, by Number 206 bus from City bus D2 platform at JR Kyoto Station.

sen.j: 京都市営地下鉄東西線東山駅より、徒歩約5分。
sen.e: About 5 minute walk from Kyoto City Subway Tozai Line Higashiyama Station.
About 5 minute walk from Kyoto City Subway Tozai Line Higashiyama Station.
About 5 minute walk from Kyoto City Subway Tozai Line Higashiyama Station.

sen.j: 京阪三条駅・京阪四条駅より、ともに徒歩約10分。
sen.e: About 10 minute walk from either Keihan Sanjo Station or Gion-shijo Station.
About 10 minute walk from either Keihan Sanjo Station or Gion-shijo Station.
About 10 minute walk from either Keihan Sanjo Station or Gion-shijo Station.

sen.j: 阪急河原町駅より、徒歩約15分。
sen.e: About 15 minute walk from Hankyu Kawaramachi Station.
About a 15 minute walk from Hankyu Kawaramachi Station.
sen.cmt: grammarPlease check why "a" is added in this sentence. The above two senteces are marked as "OK".
sen.e: About a 15 minute walk from Hankyu Kawaramachi Station.
